text: Harold Vernon Gould (December 10, 1923 - September 11, 2010) was an American movie, stage, and television actor. He appeared in 100 movies and television shows. He is mostly known for his television role as Miles Webber in The Golden Girls. Gould was born in Schenectady, New York on December 10, 1923. He was married to Lea Vernon from 1950 until his death in 2010. They had three children. Gould died on September 11, 2010 in Woodland Hills, California from prostate cancer, aged 86.Harold Gould dies at 86 ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Harold Gould at TV.com * Harold Gould biography at Lycos Movies Category:1923 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television personalities Category:Jewish American actors Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:People from Schenectady, New York
title: Harold Gould
